name: Shadow's Assault
description:
Your shadow assaults your foes. You can cast shadow blast as a 5th-level occult innate spell once per day. At 17th level, your shadow blast is heightened to 6th level.Traits

Fetchling: A creature with this trait is a member of the fetchling ancestry. Fetchlings were once human, but generations of life on the Shadow Plane have transformed them.
